pageProduct.name: White Glo Activated Charcoal Teeth Polishing Powder 30g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

This highly absorbent Activated Charcoal penetrates and draws out stubborn stains, traps colour particles, fights bad breath and whitens teeth enamel. Uses the natural elements of Activated Charcoal to clean and whiten teeth!
 
High Absorbent Activated Charcoal
Cleans deep stains and discolouration
Effectively whitens teeth

Directions

1. Use the spoon to apply a small amount of powder to your wet toothbrush. 2. Brush your teeth gently for 2 minutes. 3. Rinse mouth thoroughly with water to reveal a whiter smile!

USAGE ADVICE

Other helpful tips:
- Brush with your lips closed to reduce mess.
- Brush with White Glo Toothpaste after each treatment to maximise whitening effect and to remove all residual powder.
- Use once daily for best results.
- Not recommended for children under 12.
